sentences.sentence: Most breakfast cereals are enriched with vitamins.
sentences.translation: 多数谷类早餐食物都添加了维生素。

sentences.sentence: Three hundred thousand tons of cereals are needed to replenish stocks.
sentences.translation: 需要30万吨谷物才能重新装满仓库。

sentences.sentence: His commercial endorsements for everything from running shoes to breakfast cereals will take his earnings to more than ten million dollars a year.
sentences.translation: 他的商业代言从跑鞋到早餐麦片一应俱全，令其年收入达到一千多万美元。
